if you want all the details uh read the
original paper in my opinion it's super
well written and I highly recommend
it so when Alice runs a program what the
operating system does is it loads the
binary into physical memory and it sets
up a process and then it uses the page
tables to map some of that virtual
address space into the physical
memory now when Scarlet comes along and
runs the exact same program
the operating system could load a second
copy into physical memory uh but that
would be wasteful because the program's
not changing so what it does instead is
it just uses the page tables to map
Scarlet's virtual memory into the exact
same physical
memory and this should be okay because
the memories read only right so there
should be no way that scarlet and Alice
um there should be no way that they can
influence each other uh through this
shared memory but in reality there's a
cache in in front of the memory and all
of the lines of memory are either in the
cache or out of the cache and what the
cache really is is some shared State
between Alice and Scarlet that they can
both influence and that they can both be
influenced
by so the way flush plus reload uses
this is that when Alice's program is
executing code that code's going to get
readed from memory and as it's being
read from memory it's going to get
loaded into the
cache now if Scarlet comes along and
reads from the same address of
code uh that read is going to happen
really fast because it's already in the
cache if Scarlet reads from some memory
that Alice hasn't been executing in a
while that read is going to be slow it
won't be in the
cache so sort of by timing uh reads to
various addresses in memory Scarlet can
tell which code Alice has been executing
recently so when you put it together it
looks like like this Scarlet can
sprinkle some light bulbs all over the
code and when Alice's thread of
execution passes by one of those light
bulbs it's going to light up and
Scarlet's going to see
that then what Scarlet can do is flush
the cache to turn off all the light
bulbs and wait a little bit for Alice to
run some more
code this time Alice runs the bar and

light bulbs light
up Scarlet flushes the cach to turn them
off Scarlet Waits a little bit for Alice
